brief_summary.textblock: Efficacy and Safety of Acupuncture Treatment as an Adjunctive Therapy After Knee Replacement

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Korean version of Western Ontario and McMaster Universities Arthritis Index
primary_outcome.description: K-WOMAC is widely used in the evaluation of Hip and Knee Osteoarthritis. It is a self-administered questionnaire consisting of 24 items divided into 3 subscales

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Numeric rating scale
secondary_outcome.description: NRS range was 0-10 with 0 being no pain and 10 the worst pain possible.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Physical Condition related with mobility at every visit
secondary_outcome.description: mobility (5 meters walking test at comfortable speed - 5mWT) (meters/second)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Physical Condition related with endurance at every visit
Change from baseline in Timed Up and Go Test at every visit
secondary_outcome.description: a functional test evaluating the time to rise from a chair, walk 3 meters, turn around, walk back to the chair and sit down (abnormal cut-off value >12 seconds).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Alternative-Step Test at every visit
secondary_outcome.description: a functional test measuring clinical balance performance, and it has been shown to predict fall risk among elderly subjects (seconds)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Range of motion
secondary_outcome.description: Compare flexion and extension angle using long arm goniometer between experimental and comparator group

arm_group.description: Acupuncture with Cnoxane Injection 40mg, Esomezol Capsule, Synerjet Semi Tablet and Ocoron Tablet
Cnoxane Injection 40mg, Esomezol Capsule, Synerjet Semi Tablet and Ocoron Tablet

intervention.description: patients after surgery receive usual care(Cnoxane Injection 40mg, Esomezol Capsule, Synerjet Semi Tablet and Ocoron Tablet) as well as acupuncture treatment as an adjunctive therapy
patients after surgery receive usual care alone(Cnoxane Injection 40mg, Esomezol Capsule, Synerjet Semi Tablet and Ocoron Tablet)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject has a diagnosis of osteoarthritis and listed for an unilateral total knee replacement.
- Subject has a normal cognitive function
- Subject is willing and able to give informed consent for participation in the study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Those who have undergone total knee arthroplasty due to gout
- Those who have had total knee arthroplasty due to trauma
- Those who have had total knee arthroplasty due to autoimmune related diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis
- Those who are participating in other clinical trials
- Those who have a history of participating in other clinical trials within one month
- Those who are difficult to write a research consent form
- Those who are judged to be inappropriate for the clinical study by the researchers.
